analyzed: ratnatrayam namaskṛtya sarva sattva hita udayam
kathyate moha nāśāya dharma sāra samuccayaḥ
tathā yā buddhaḥ dharmaḥ saṃghaḥ ca iti
aṣṭa lokapāla adhikam ūrdhvam brahmā adhas kṛṣṇaḥ
śīla samādhi prajñā vimukti vimukti jñāna darśana skandhāḥ iti
cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya mana āyatanāni rūpa gandha śabda rasa sparśa dharma āyatanāni ca iti
cakṣuḥ śrotra ghrāṇa jihvā kāya manaḥ rūpa gandha śabda rasa sparśa dharma dhātavaḥ cakṣuḥ vijñāna śrotra vijñāna ghrāṇa vijñāna jihvā vijñāna kāya vijñāna manaḥ vijñāna ghātavaḥ ca iti
tatra citta viprayukta saṃskāra asra yodaśa
śoka parideva duḥkha daurmanasya upāyāsāḥ ca iti
tat yathā kāye kāya anudarśa smṛti upasthānam
tat yathā utpannānām kuśala mūlānām saṃrakṣaṇam
tat yathā chanda samādhi prahāṇāya saṃskāra samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaḥ
mīmāṃsā samādhi prahāṇāya saṃskāra samanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ ca iti
tat yathā śraddhā samādhi vīrya smṛti prajñā indriyam ca iti
śraddhā vīrya smṛti samādhi prajñā balam ca iti
tat yathā artha pratiśaraṇa tā na vyañjana pratiśaraṇa tā
jñāna pratiśaraṇa tā na vijñāna pratiśaraṇa tā
nīta artha pratiśaraṇa tā na neya artha pratiśaraṇa tā
dharma pratiśaraṇa tā na pudgala pratiśaraṇa tā ca iti
tat yathā rūpī rūpāṇī paśyati śūnyam
ādhyātma arūpa saṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati śūnyam
na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatanam paśyati śūnyam
saṃjñā vedayita nirodham paśyati śūnyam ca iti

original: tadyathā - savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhamiti prathamadhyānam /
analyzed: tat yathā sa vitarkam sa vicāram viveka jam prīti sukham iti prathama dhyānam
adhyātma pramodanāt prīti sukham iti dvitīyam
upekṣā smṛti saṃprajanyam sukham iti tṛtīyam
upekṣā smṛti pariśuddhiḥ aduḥkha asukhā vedanā iti caturtham dhyānam iti
tat yathā sthāna asthāna jñāna balam
dhyāna vimokṣa samādhi samāpatti saṃkleśa vyavadāna vyutthāna jñāna balam
āsrava kṣaya jñāna balam ca iti
nairvāṇika mārga avataraṇa vaiśāradyam antarāyika dharma ananyathātva niścita vyākaraṇa vaiśāradyam ca iti
tat yathā na asti tathāgatasya skhalitam
na asti vimukti jñāna darśana parihāṇiḥ
sarva kāya karma jñāna pūrva gama jñāna anuparivṛttiḥ
sarva vāc karma jñāna pūrvaṃgama jñāna anuparivṛttiḥ
sarva manaskarma jñāna pūrvaṃgama jñāna anuparivṛttiḥ
pratyutpanne dhvanya saṅgam apratihata jñāna darśanam ca iti
tat yathā cakra aṅkita pāṇi pāda tala tā
su pratiṣṭhita pāṇi pāda tala tā
mṛdu taruṇa hasta pāda tala tā
go pakṣa netra tā ca iti
sita asita kamala dala nayana tā
śrīvatsa muktika nandyāvarta lakṣita pāṇi pāda tala tā ca iti
tat yathā pūrva anta koṭi parijñāyāḥ
catur māra koṭi parijñāyāḥ ca iti
su viśuddha dharmadhātu jñānam ca iti
dve satye tat yathā saṃvṛti satyam
catur ārya satyeṣu ṣoḍaśa kṣānti jñāna lakṣaṇāḥ
tat yathā duḥkhe dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ
samudaye dharma jñāna kṣāntiḥ dhs vaidya
śraddhā vimuktiḥ dṛṣṭi prāptaḥ ekavīcīkaḥ na agāmī antarā parinirvāyī upahatya parinirvāyī

original: abhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī pluto 'rddhaplutaḥ sarvāstānapluto dṛṣṭadharmasamaḥ kāyasākṣī khaṅgaśceti //
analyzed: abhisaṃskāra parinirvāyī plutaḥ rddhaplutaḥ sarvāstānaplutaḥ dṛṣṭadharmasamaḥ kāya sākṣī khaṅgaḥ ca iti

original: katamat? tadyathā - idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyamiti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasiṃgavataḥ(?)
analyzed: katamat tat yathā idam duḥkham ārya satyam iti bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśas manasiṃgavataḥ

original: ityekaparicatakaḥ 1 idaṃ duḥkhamārya sa tatra khalvabhijñātaṃ iti bhikṣavaḥ /
analyzed: iti eka paricatakaḥ idam duḥkham ārya sa tatra khalu abhijñātam iti bhikṣavaḥ

original: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatvaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
analyzed: idam duḥkha samudayam ārya satvam tava khalu abhijñāya prahīṇam iti hi tyādi tṛtīyaḥ
tathā idam duḥkha nirodhaḥ ārya satyam iti hi pratyekaḥ

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya śākṣāt kartavyamiti hitya dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: idam duḥkha nirodha ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya śākṣāt kartavyam iti dvitīyaḥ

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhaāryasatya tatra khalu bhijñāya śākṣāt dvitīya /

analyzed: tat yathā idam duḥkha mārga gāminī

original: idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāmini pratipa ityāryyasatyaṃ tatra khalu bhijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
analyzed: idam duḥkha mokṣa gāmini pratipe iti āryya satyam tatra khalu bhijñāya bhāvayitavyam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi tṛtīyaḥ
parivartaḥ iti eva dvādaśa ākāra dharmacakra pravarttanam iti
idam duḥkham ārya satyam iti bhikṣavaḥ

original: pūrvamanuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasigavataḥ cakṣurudapādi /
analyzed: pūrvam anuśrutya teṣu dharmeṣu yoniśas manasigavataḥ cakṣuḥ udapādi

original: ityekaparivartaka idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ /
analyzed: iti eka parivartake idam duḥkham ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya parijñātam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ
idam ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñātam iti bhikṣavaḥ

original: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tava khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam //
analyzed: idam duḥkha samudayam ārya satyam tava khalu abhijñāya prahīṇam iti hi ityādi tṛtīyam

original: tathā idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyamiti hi pratyekaḥ //
analyzed: tathā idam duḥkha nirodhaḥ ārya satyam iti hi pratyekaḥ

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kartavyamiti hityādi /
analyzed: idam duḥkha nirodhe ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya sākṣāt kartavyam iti hi tyādi

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodha āryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣāt kṛtamiti dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: idam duḥkha nirodhaḥ ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya sākṣāt kṛtam iti dvitīyaḥ
tathā idam duḥkha mārga gāmini pratipad ārya satyam iti

original: ityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhātavyamiti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi tṛtīyaḥ /
analyzed: iti ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya bhātavyam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi tṛtīyaḥ
parivarttaḥ iti evam dvādaśa ākāra dharma cakra pravartanam iti
tat atra dvādaśa ākāra dharma cakra pravartakam
katamat idam duḥkham ārya satyam iti me

original: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvataḥ cakṣurudapādi jñānamudapādi vidyodapādi bhūrirudapādītyekaṃ parivartakam /
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam an anuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśas manasikurvataḥ cakṣuḥ udapādi jñānam udapādi vidyā udapādi bhūriḥ udapādi iti ekam parivartakam

original: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti hi (me)
analyzed: idam duḥkham ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya parijñātam iti hi me

original: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamananuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśo manasikurvata iti dvitīyam /
analyzed: bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam an anuśruteṣu dharmeṣu yoniśas manasikurvataḥ iti dvitīyam

original: idaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya parijñātamiti bhikṣavaḥ ityādi pūrvavaditi tṛtīyam //
analyzed: idam duḥkham ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya parijñātam iti bhikṣavaḥ ityādi pūrvavat iti tṛtīyam
tathā idam duḥkha samudayam ārya satyam iti pratyekam

original: idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahātavyamiti dvitīyam /
analyzed: idam duḥkha samudayam ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya prahātavyam iti dvitīyam

original: ] idaṃ duḥkhasamudayamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya prahīṇamiti hītyādi tṛtīyam /
analyzed: idam duḥkha samudayam ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya prahīṇam iti hi ityādi tṛtīyam
tathā idam duḥkha nirodham ārya satyam iti hi pratyekam

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkartavyamiti hītyādi dvitīyam /
analyzed: idam duḥkha nirodham ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya sākṣātkartavyam iti hi ityādi dvitīyam

original: idaṃ duḥkhanirodhamāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtamiti tṛtīyam //
analyzed: idam duḥkha nirodham ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtam iti tṛtīyam
tathā iyam duḥkha mārga gāminī pratipad iti ārya satyam iti pratyekam

original: iyaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhivijñāya bhāvayitavyamiti hi bhikṣava ityādi dvitīyam /
analyzed: iyam duḥkha mokṣa gāminī pratipad iti ārya satyam tatra khalu abhivijñāya bhāvayitavyam iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ityādi dvitīyam

original: [idaṃ duḥkhamokṣagāminī pratipadityāryasatyaṃ tatra khalvabhijñāya bhāvitamiti tṛtīyam // ]
analyzed: idam duḥkha mokṣa gāminī pratipad iti ārya satyam tatra khalu abhijñāya bhāvitam iti tṛtīyam
sattva artha kriyā śīlam ca iti
para upakāra dharma kṣāntiḥ ca iti
tat yathā sa doṣa apakarṣa dhyānam
māna pramāda ādi vyāvartakam ca iti
satya artha upāya parokṣam ca iti
tat yathā cakravāla mahā cakravālau ca iti
na eva saṃjñā na asaṃjñā āyatana upagāḥ ca iti
citta utpāda virāgi tatā ca iti
na eva śāśvataḥ na a śāśvataḥ ca
na eva antavān na anantavān ca

original: bhavati na ca bhavati ca tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt,
analyzed: bhavati na ca bhavati ca tathāgataḥ param maraṇāt

original: naiva bhavati na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāt /
analyzed: na eva bhavati na bhavati tathāgataḥ param maraṇāt
anyaḥ jīvaḥ nyat śarīram ca iti
iti nāgārjuna pāda viracitaḥ yam dharmasaṃgrahaḥ samāptaḥ
